dn34:1.6.59: Tassa tam cittam sugatam subhavitam suvutthitam suvimuttam visamyuttam rupehi.
dn34:1.6.60: Ye ca rupapaccaya uppajjanti asava vighata parilaha, mutto so tehi. Na so tam vedanam vedeti.

dn34:1.6.65: Ye ca sakkayapaccaya uppajjanti asava vighata parilaha, mutto so tehi. Na so tam vedanam vedeti.

dn34:1.7.37: atha ca pana me byapado cittam pariyadaya titthati’ti.
dn34:1.7.38: So ‘ma hevan’tissa vacaniyo ‘mayasma evam avaca, ma bhagavantam abbhacikkhi. Na hi sadhu bhagavato abbhakkhanam, na hi bhagava evam vadeyya.
dn34:1.7.39: Atthanametam avuso anavakaso yam mettaya cetovimuttiya bhavitaya bahulikataya yanikataya vatthukataya anutthitaya paricitaya susamaraddhaya.
dn34:1.7.40: Atha ca panassa byapado cittam pariyadaya thassatiti, netam thanam vijjati.
dn34:1.7.41: Nissaranam hetam, avuso, byapadassa, yadidam mettacetovimutti’ti.
dn34:1.7.43: ‘karuna hi kho me cetovimutti bhavita bahulikata yanikata vatthukata anutthita paricita susamaraddha.
dn34:1.7.44: Atha ca pana me vihesa cittam pariyadaya titthati’ti.
dn34:1.7.45: So: ‘ma hevan’tissa vacaniyo, ‘mayasma evam avaca, ma bhagavantam abbhacikkhi …pe…

dn34:1.7.54: atha ca pana me rago cittam pariyadaya titthati’ti.

dn34:1.7.63: ‘asmiti kho me vigatam, ayamahamasmiti na samanupassami,
dn34:1.7.64: atha ca pana me vicikicchakathankathasallam cittam pariyadaya titthati’ti.
dn34:1.7.65: So: ‘ma hevan’tissa vacaniyo ‘mayasma evam avaca, ma bhagavantam abbhacikkhi, na hi sadhu bhagavato abbhakkhanam, na hi bhagava evam vadeyya.

dn34:1.7.67: Atha ca panassa vicikicchakathankathasallam cittam pariyadaya thassati, netam thanam vijjati.
dn34:1.7.68: Nissaranam hetam, avuso, vicikicchakathankathasallassa, yadidam asmimanasamugghato’ti.

dn34:1.8.52: Patisallane tibbacchando hoti, ayatinca patisallane avigatapemo.
dn34:1.8.53: Viriyarambhe tibbacchando hoti, ayatinca viriyarambhe avigatapemo.
dn34:1.8.54: Satinepakke tibbacchando hoti, ayatinca satinepakke avigatapemo.
dn34:1.8.55: Ditthipativedhe tibbacchando hoti, ayatinca ditthipativedhe avigatapemo.
dn34:1.8.59: idhavuso, khinasavassa bhikkhuno aniccato sabbe sankhara yathabhutam sammappannaya sudittha honti.
dn34:1.8.60: Yampavuso, khinasavassa bhikkhuno aniccato sabbe sankhara yathabhutam sammappannaya sudittha honti, idampi khinasavassa bhikkhuno balam hoti, yam balam agamma khinasavo bhikkhu asavanam khayam patijanati: ‘khina me asava’ti.
dn34:1.8.61: Puna caparam, avuso, khinasavassa bhikkhuno angarakasupama kama yathabhutam sammappannaya sudittha honti.
dn34:1.8.63: Puna caparam, avuso, khinasavassa bhikkhuno vivekaninnam cittam hoti vivekaponam vivekapabbharam vivekattham nekkhammabhiratam byantibhutam sabbaso asavatthaniyehi dhammehi.
dn34:1.8.65: Puna caparam, avuso, khinasavassa bhikkhuno cattaro satipatthana bhavita honti subhavita.
dn34:1.8.67: Puna caparam, avuso, khinasavassa bhikkhuno pancindriyani bhavitani honti subhavitani.
dn34:1.8.69: Puna caparam, avuso, khinasavassa bhikkhuno satta bojjhanga bhavita honti subhavita.
dn34:1.8.71: Puna caparam, avuso, khinasavassa bhikkhuno ariyo atthangiko maggo bhavito hoti subhavito.
dn34:1.8.72: Yampavuso, khinasavassa bhikkhuno ariyo atthangiko maggo bhavito hoti subhavito, idampi khinasavassa bhikkhuno balam hoti, yam balam agamma khinasavo bhikkhu asavanam khayam patijanati:
dn34:1.8.75: Itime sattati dhamma bhuta taccha tatha avitatha anannatha samma tathagatena abhisambuddha.
dn34:2.1.1: Attha dhamma bahukara …pe… attha dhamma sacchikatabba.
dn34:2.1.3: Attha hetu attha paccaya adibrahmacariyikaya pannaya appatiladdhaya patilabhaya patiladdhaya bhiyyobhavaya vepullaya bhavanaya paripuriya samvattanti.
dn34:2.1.5: Idhavuso, bhikkhu sattharam upanissaya viharati annataram va garutthaniyam sabrahmacarim, yatthassa tibbam hirottappam paccupatthitam hoti pemanca garavo ca.
dn34:2.1.6: Ayam pathamo hetu pathamo paccayo adibrahmacariyikaya pannaya appatiladdhaya patilabhaya, patiladdhaya bhiyyobhavaya vepullaya bhavanaya paripuriya samvattati.
dn34:2.1.7: Tam kho pana sattharam upanissaya viharati annataram va garutthaniyam sabrahmacarim, yatthassa tibbam hirottappam paccupatthitam hoti pemanca garavo ca. Te kalena kalam upasankamitva paripucchati paripanhati:
dn34:2.1.10: Tassa te ayasmanto avivatanceva vivaranti, anuttanikatanca uttanikaronti, anekavihitesu ca kankhatthaniyesu dhammesu kankham pativinodenti.
dn34:2.1.11: Ayam dutiyo hetu dutiyo paccayo adibrahmacariyikaya pannaya appatiladdhaya patilabhaya, patiladdhaya bhiyyobhavaya, vepullaya bhavanaya paripuriya samvattati.
dn34:2.1.12: Tam kho pana dhammam sutva dvayena vupakasena sampadeti—kayavupakasena ca cittavupakasena ca.
dn34:2.1.13: Ayam tatiyo hetu tatiyo paccayo adibrahmacariyikaya pannaya appatiladdhaya patilabhaya, patiladdhaya bhiyyobhavaya vepullaya bhavanaya paripuriya samvattati.
dn34:2.1.14: Puna caparam, avuso, bhikkhu silava hoti, patimokkhasamvarasamvuto viharati acaragocarasampanno, anumattesu vajjesu bhayadassavi samadaya sikkhati sikkhapadesu.
dn34:2.1.15: Ayam catuttho hetu catuttho paccayo adibrahmacariyikaya pannaya appatiladdhaya patilabhaya, patiladdhaya bhiyyobhavaya vepullaya bhavanaya paripuriya samvattati.
dn34:2.1.16: Puna caparam, avuso, bhikkhu bahussuto hoti sutadharo sutasannicayo. Ye te dhamma adikalyana majjhekalyana pariyosanakalyana sattha sabyanjana kevalaparipunnam parisuddham brahmacariyam abhivadanti, tatharupassa dhamma bahussuta honti dhata vacasa paricita manasanupekkhita ditthiya suppatividdha.
dn34:2.1.17: Ayam pancamo hetu pancamo paccayo adibrahmacariyikaya pannaya appatiladdhaya patilabhaya, patiladdhaya bhiyyobhavaya vepullaya bhavanaya paripuriya samvattati.
dn34:2.1.18: Puna caparam, avuso, bhikkhu araddhaviriyo viharati akusalanam dhammanam pahanaya, kusalanam dhammanam upasampadaya, thamava dalhaparakkamo anikkhittadhuro kusalesu dhammesu.
dn34:2.1.19: Ayam chattho hetu chattho paccayo adibrahmacariyikaya pannaya appatiladdhaya patilabhaya, patiladdhaya bhiyyobhavaya vepullaya bhavanaya paripuriya samvattati.
dn34:2.1.20: Puna caparam, avuso, bhikkhu satima hoti paramena satinepakkena samannagato. Cirakatampi cirabhasitampi sarita anussarita.
dn34:2.1.21: Ayam sattamo hetu sattamo paccayo adibrahmacariyikaya pannaya appatiladdhaya patilabhaya, patiladdhaya bhiyyobhavaya vepullaya bhavanaya paripuriya samvattati.
dn34:2.1.22: Puna caparam, avuso, bhikkhu pancasu upadanakkhandhesu, udayabbayanupassi viharati:
dn34:2.1.23: ‘iti rupam iti rupassa samudayo iti rupassa atthangamo;
dn34:2.1.24: iti vedana iti vedanaya samudayo iti vedanaya atthangamo;
dn34:2.1.25: iti sanna iti sannaya samudayo iti sannaya atthangamo;
dn34:2.1.26: iti sankhara iti sankharanam samudayo iti sankharanam atthangamo;
dn34:2.1.27: iti vinnanam iti vinnanassa samudayo iti vinnanassa atthangamo’ti.
dn34:2.1.28: Ayam atthamo hetu atthamo paccayo adibrahmacariyikaya pannaya appatiladdhaya patilabhaya, patiladdhaya bhiyyobhavaya vepullaya bhavanaya paripuriya samvattati.
dn34:2.1.32: sammaditthi, sammasankappo, sammavaca, sammakammanto, sammaajivo, sammavayamo, sammasati, sammasamadhi.
dn34:2.1.36: labho ca, alabho ca, yaso ca, ayaso ca, ninda ca, pasamsa ca, sukhanca, dukkhanca.
dn34:2.1.40: micchaditthi, micchasankappo, micchavaca, micchakammanto, micchaajivo, micchavayamo, micchasati, micchasamadhi.
dn34:2.1.46: ‘kammam kho me katabbam bhavissati, kammam kho pana me karontassa kayo kilamissati, handaham nipajjami’ti.
dn34:2.1.47: So nipajjati, na viriyam arabhati appattassa pattiya anadhigatassa adhigamaya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyaya.
dn34:2.1.49: Puna caparam, avuso, bhikkhuna kammam katam hoti.
dn34:2.1.51: ‘aham kho kammam akasim, kammam kho pana me karontassa kayo kilanto, handaham nipajjami’ti.
dn34:2.1.54: Puna caparam, avuso, bhikkhuna maggo gantabbo hoti.
dn34:2.1.56: ‘maggo kho me gantabbo bhavissati, maggam kho pana me gacchantassa kayo kilamissati, handaham nipajjami’ti.
dn34:2.1.59: Puna caparam, avuso, bhikkhuna maggo gato hoti.
dn34:2.1.61: ‘aham kho maggam agamasim, maggam kho pana me gacchantassa kayo kilanto, handaham nipajjami’ti.
dn34:2.1.64: Puna caparam, avuso, bhikkhu gamam va nigamam va pindaya caranto na labhati lukhassa va panitassa va bhojanassa yavadattham paripurim.
dn34:2.1.66: ‘aham kho gamam va nigamam va pindaya caranto nalattham lukhassa va panitassa va bhojanassa yavadattham paripurim, tassa me kayo kilanto akammanno, handaham nipajjami’ti …pe…
dn34:2.1.68: Puna caparam, avuso, bhikkhu gamam va nigamam va pindaya caranto labhati lukhassa va panitassa va bhojanassa yavadattham paripurim.
dn34:2.1.70: ‘aham kho gamam va nigamam va pindaya caranto alattham lukhassa va panitassa va bhojanassa yavadattham paripurim, tassa me kayo garuko akammanno, masacitam manne, handaham nipajjami’ti.
dn34:2.1.73: Puna caparam, avuso, bhikkhuno uppanno hoti appamattako abadho, tassa evam hoti:
dn34:2.1.74: ‘uppanno kho me ayam appamattako abadho atthi kappo nipajjitum, handaham nipajjami’ti.
dn34:2.1.77: Puna caparam, avuso, bhikkhu gilanavutthito hoti aciravutthito gelanna.
dn34:2.1.80: Tassa me kayo dubbalo akammanno, handaham nipajjami’ti.
dn34:2.1.86: Idhavuso, bhikkhuna kammam katabbam hoti, tassa evam hoti:
dn34:2.1.87: ‘kammam kho me katabbam bhavissati, kammam kho pana me karontena na sukaram buddhanam sasanam manasikatum, handaham viriyam arabhami appattassa pattiya anadhigatassa adhigamaya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyaya’ti.
dn34:2.1.88: So viriyam arabhati appattassa pattiya anadhigatassa adhigamaya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyaya.
dn34:2.1.90: Puna caparam, avuso, bhikkhuna kammam katam hoti.
dn34:2.1.92: ‘aham kho kammam akasim, kammam kho panaham karonto nasakkhim buddhanam sasanam manasikatum, handaham viriyam arabhami …pe…
dn34:2.1.94: Puna caparam, avuso, bhikkhuna maggo gantabbo hoti.
dn34:2.1.96: ‘maggo kho me gantabbo bhavissati, maggam kho pana me gacchantena na sukaram buddhanam sasanam manasikatum, handaham viriyam arabhami …pe…
dn34:2.1.98: Puna caparam, avuso, bhikkhuna maggo gato hoti.
dn34:2.1.100: ‘aham kho maggam agamasim, maggam kho panaham gacchanto nasakkhim buddhanam sasanam manasikatum, handaham viriyam arabhami …pe…
dn34:2.1.102: Puna caparam, avuso, bhikkhu gamam va nigamam va pindaya caranto na labhati lukhassa va panitassa va bhojanassa yavadattham paripurim.
dn34:2.1.104: ‘aham kho gamam va nigamam va pindaya caranto nalattham lukhassa va panitassa va bhojanassa yavadattham paripurim, tassa me kayo lahuko kammanno, handaham viriyam arabhami …pe…
dn34:2.1.106: Puna caparam, avuso, bhikkhu gamam va nigamam va pindaya caranto labhati lukhassa va panitassa va bhojanassa yavadattham paripurim.
dn34:2.1.108: ‘aham kho gamam va nigamam va pindaya caranto alattham lukhassa va panitassa va bhojanassa yavadattham paripurim.
dn34:2.1.109: Tassa me kayo balava kammanno, handaham viriyam arabhami …pe…
dn34:2.1.111: Puna caparam, avuso, bhikkhuno uppanno hoti appamattako abadho.
dn34:2.1.113: ‘uppanno kho me ayam appamattako abadho thanam kho panetam vijjati, yam me abadho pavaddheyya, handaham viriyam arabhami …pe…
dn34:2.1.115: Puna caparam, avuso, bhikkhu gilana vutthito hoti aciravutthito gelanna.
dn34:2.1.117: ‘aham kho gilana vutthito aciravutthito gelanna, thanam kho panetam vijjati, yam me abadho paccudavatteyya, handaham viriyam arabhami appattassa pattiya anadhigatassa adhigamaya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyaya’ti.
dn34:2.1.118: So viriyam arabhati appattassa pattiya anadhigatassa adhigamaya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyaya.
dn34:2.1.123: Idhavuso, tathagato ca loke uppanno hoti araham sammasambuddho, dhammo ca desiyati opasamiko parinibbaniko sambodhagami sugatappavedito.
dn34:2.1.126: Puna caparam, avuso, tathagato ca loke uppanno hoti araham sammasambuddho, dhammo ca desiyati opasamiko parinibbaniko sambodhagami sugatappavedito.
dn34:2.1.136: paccantimesu janapadesu paccajato hoti milakkhesu avinnataresu, yattha natthi gati bhikkhunam bhikkhuninam upasakanam upasikanam.
dn34:2.1.139: ayanca puggalo majjhimesu janapadesu paccajato hoti, so ca hoti micchaditthiko viparitadassano:
dn34:2.1.140: ‘natthi dinnam, natthi yittham, natthi hutam, natthi sukatadukkatanam kammanam phalam vipako, natthi ayam loko, natthi paro loko, natthi mata, natthi pita, natthi satta opapatika, natthi loke samanabrahmana sammaggata sammapatipanna ye imanca lokam paranca lokam sayam abhinna sacchikatva pavedenti’ti.
dn34:2.1.143: ayanca puggalo majjhimesu janapadesu paccajato hoti, so ca hoti duppanno jalo elamugo, nappatibalo subhasitadubbhasitanamatthamannatum.
dn34:2.1.146: ayanca puggalo majjhimesu janapadesu paccajato hoti, so ca hoti pannava ajalo anelamugo, patibalo subhasitadubbhasitanamatthamannatum.
dn34:2.1.157: Pannavato ayam dhammo, nayam dhammo duppannassa.
dn34:2.1.158: Nippapancassayam dhammo, nayam dhammo papancaramassati ime attha dhamma uppadetabba.
dn34:2.1.161: ajjhattam rupasanni eko bahiddha rupani passati parittani suvannadubbannani, ‘tani abhibhuyya janami passami’ti—
dn34:2.1.164: Ajjhattam rupasanni eko bahiddha rupani passati appamanani suvannadubbannani, ‘tani abhibhuyya janami passami’ti—
dn34:2.1.167: Ajjhattam arupasanni eko bahiddha rupani passati parittani suvannadubbannani, ‘tani abhibhuyya janami passami’ti—
dn34:2.1.170: Ajjhattam arupasanni eko bahiddha rupani passati appamanani suvannadubbannani, ‘tani abhibhuyya janami passami’ti—
dn34:2.1.173: Ajjhattam arupasanni eko bahiddha rupani passati nilani nilavannani nilanidassanani nilanibhasani.
dn34:2.1.174: Seyyathapi nama umapuppham nilam nilavannam nilanidassanam nilanibhasam, seyyatha va pana tam vattham baranaseyyakam ubhatobhagavimattham nilam nilavannam nilanidassanam nilanibhasam;
dn34:2.1.175: evameva ajjhattam arupasanni eko bahiddha rupani passati nilani nilavannani nilanidassanani nilanibhasani, ‘tani abhibhuyya janami passami’ti evamsanni hoti.
dn34:2.1.177: Ajjhattam arupasanni eko bahiddha rupani passati pitani pitavannani pitanidassanani pitanibhasani.
dn34:2.1.178: Seyyathapi nama kanikarapuppham pitam pitavannam pitanidassanam pitanibhasam, seyyatha va pana tam vattham baranaseyyakam ubhatobhagavimattham pitam pitavannam pitanidassanam pitanibhasam;
dn34:2.1.179: evameva ajjhattam arupasanni eko bahiddha rupani passati pitani pitavannani pitanidassanani pitanibhasani, ‘tani abhibhuyya janami passami’ti evamsanni hoti.
dn34:2.1.181: Ajjhattam arupasanni eko bahiddha rupani passati lohitakani lohitakavannani lohitakanidassanani lohitakanibhasani.
dn34:2.1.182: Seyyathapi nama bandhujivakapuppham lohitakam lohitakavannam lohitakanidassanam lohitakanibhasam, seyyatha va pana tam vattham baranaseyyakam ubhatobhagavimattham lohitakam lohitakavannam lohitakanidassanam lohitakanibhasam;
dn34:2.1.183: evameva ajjhattam arupasanni eko bahiddha rupani passati lohitakani lohitakavannani lohitakanidassanani lohitakanibhasani, ‘tani abhibhuyya janami passami’ti evamsanni hoti.
dn34:2.1.185: Ajjhattam arupasanni eko bahiddha rupani passati odatani odatavannani odatanidassanani odatanibhasani.
dn34:2.1.186: Seyyathapi nama osadhitaraka odata odatavanna odatanidassana odatanibhasa, seyyatha va pana tam vattham baranaseyyakam ubhatobhagavimattham odatam odatavannam odatanidassanam odatanibhasam;
dn34:2.1.187: evameva ajjhattam arupasanni eko bahiddha rupani passati odatani odatavannani odatanidassanani odatanibhasani, ‘tani abhibhuyya janami passami’ti evamsanni hoti.
dn34:2.1.194: Ajjhattam arupasanni eko bahiddha rupani passati.
dn34:2.1.198: Sabbaso rupasannanam samatikkama patighasannanam atthangama nanattasannanam amanasikara ‘ananto akaso’ti akasanancayatanam upasampajja viharati.
dn34:2.1.200: Sabbaso akasanancayatanam samatikkamma ‘anantam vinnanan’ti vinnanancayatanam upasampajja viharati.
dn34:2.1.202: Sabbaso vinnanancayatanam samatikkamma ‘natthi kinci’ti akincannayatanam upasampajja viharati.
dn34:2.1.204: Sabbaso akincannayatanam samatikkamma nevasannanasannayatanam upasampajja viharati.
dn34:2.1.206: Sabbaso nevasannanasannayatanam samatikkamma sannavedayitanirodham upasampajja viharati.
dn34:2.1.209: Iti ime asiti dhamma bhuta taccha tatha avitatha anannatha samma tathagatena abhisambuddha.
dn34:2.2.1: Nava dhamma bahukara …pe… nava dhamma sacchikatabba.
dn34:2.2.3: Nava yonisomanasikaramulaka dhamma, yonisomanasikaroto pamojjam jayati, pamuditassa piti jayati, pitimanassa kayo passambhati, passaddhakayo sukham vedeti, sukhino cittam samadhiyati, samahite citte yathabhutam janati passati, yathabhutam janam passam nibbindati, nibbindam virajjati, viraga vimuccati.
dn34:2.2.7: silavisuddhi parisuddhipadhaniyangam, cittavisuddhi parisuddhipadhaniyangam, ditthivisuddhi parisuddhipadhaniyangam, kankhavitaranavisuddhi parisuddhipadhaniyangam, maggamaggananadassanavisuddhi parisuddhipadhaniyangam, patipadananadassanavisuddhi parisuddhipadhaniyangam, nanadassanavisuddhi parisuddhipadhaniyangam, pannavisuddhi parisuddhipadhaniyangam, vimuttivisuddhi parisuddhipadhaniyangam.
dn34:2.2.11: santavuso, satta nanattakaya nanattasannino, seyyathapi manussa ekacce ca deva ekacce ca vinipatika.
dn34:2.2.13: Santavuso, satta nanattakaya ekattasannino, seyyathapi deva brahmakayika pathamabhinibbatta.
dn34:2.2.15: Santavuso, satta ekattakaya nanattasannino, seyyathapi deva abhassara.
dn34:2.2.17: Santavuso, satta ekattakaya ekattasannino, seyyathapi deva subhakinha.
dn34:2.2.19: Santavuso, satta asannino appatisamvedino, seyyathapi deva asannasatta.
dn34:2.2.21: Santavuso, satta sabbaso rupasannanam samatikkama patighasannanam atthangama nanattasannanam amanasikara ‘ananto akaso’ti akasanancayatanupaga.
dn34:2.2.23: Santavuso, satta sabbaso akasanancayatanam samatikkamma ‘anantam vinnanan’ti vinnanancayatanupaga.
dn34:2.2.25: Santavuso, satta sabbaso vinnanancayatanam samatikkamma ‘natthi kinci’ti akincannayatanupaga.
dn34:2.2.27: Santavuso, satta sabbaso akincannayatanam samatikkamma nevasannanasannayatanupaga.
dn34:2.2.32: tanham paticca pariyesana, pariyesanam paticca labho, labham paticca vinicchayo, vinicchayam paticca chandarago, chandaragam paticca ajjhosanam, ajjhosanam paticca pariggaho, pariggaham paticca macchariyam, macchariyam paticca arakkho, arakkhadhikaranam dandadanasatthadanakalahaviggahavivadatuvamtuvampesunnamusavada aneke papaka akusala dhamma sambhavanti.
dn34:2.2.39: ‘piyassa me manapassa anattham acari’ti aghatam bandhati …pe…
dn34:2.2.42: ‘appiyassa me amanapassa attham acari’ti aghatam bandhati …pe…
dn34:2.2.48: ‘anattham me acari, tam kutettha labbha’ti aghatam pativineti;
dn34:2.2.49: ‘anattham me carati, tam kutettha labbha’ti aghatam pativineti;
dn34:2.2.50: ‘anattham me carissati, tam kutettha labbha’ti aghatam pativineti;
dn34:2.2.53: anattham carissati, tam kutettha labbha’ti aghatam pativineti;
dn34:2.2.56: attham carissati, tam kutettha labbha’ti aghatam pativineti.
dn34:2.2.60: dhatunanattam paticca uppajjati phassananattam, phassananattam paticca uppajjati vedanananattam, vedanananattam paticca uppajjati sannananattam, sannananattam paticca uppajjati sankappananattam, sankappananattam paticca uppajjati chandananattam, chandananattam paticca uppajjati parilahananattam, parilahananattam paticca uppajjati pariyesanananattam, pariyesanananattam paticca uppajjati labhananattam (…).
dn34:2.2.64: asubhasanna, maranasanna, ahare patikulasanna, sabbaloke anabhiratisanna, aniccasanna, anicce dukkhasanna, dukkhe anattasanna, pahanasanna, viragasanna.
dn34:2.2.68: idhavuso, bhikkhu vivicceva kamehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakkam savicaram vivekajam pitisukham pathamam jhanam upasampajja viharati.
dn34:2.2.69: Vitakkavicaranam vupasama …pe… dutiyam jhanam upasampajja viharati.
dn34:2.2.70: Pitiya ca viraga …pe… tatiyam jhanam upasampajja viharati.
dn34:2.2.71: Sukhassa ca pahana …pe… catuttham jhanam upasampajja viharati.
dn34:2.2.72: Sabbaso rupasannanam samatikkama …pe… akasanancayatanam upasampajja viharati.
dn34:2.2.73: Sabbaso akasanancayatanam samatikkamma ‘anantam vinnanan’ti vinnanancayatanam upasampajja viharati.
dn34:2.2.74: Sabbaso vinnanancayatanam samatikkamma ‘natthi kinci’ti akincannayatanam upasampajja viharati.
dn34:2.2.75: Sabbaso akincannayatanam samatikkamma nevasannanasannayatanam upasampajja viharati.
dn34:2.2.76: Sabbaso nevasannanasannayatanam samatikkamma sannavedayitanirodham upasampajja viharati.
dn34:2.2.80: pathamam jhanam samapannassa kamasanna niruddha hoti,
dn34:2.2.81: dutiyam jhanam samapannassa vitakkavicara niruddha honti,
dn34:2.2.82: tatiyam jhanam samapannassa piti niruddha hoti,
dn34:2.2.83: catuttham jhanam samapannassa assasapassassa niruddha honti,
dn34:2.2.88: sannavedayitanirodham samapannassa sanna ca vedana ca niruddha honti.
dn34:2.2.90: Iti ime navuti dhamma bhuta taccha tatha avitatha anannatha samma tathagatena abhisambuddha.
dn34:2.3.1: Dasa dhamma bahukara …pe… dasa dhamma sacchikatabba.
dn34:2.3.4: idhavuso, bhikkhu silava hoti, patimokkhasamvarasamvuto viharati acaragocarasampanno, anumattesu vajjesu bhayadassavi samadaya sikkhati sikkhapadesu.
dn34:2.3.5: Yampavuso, bhikkhu silava hoti …pe… sikkhati sikkhapadesu.
dn34:2.3.7: Puna caparam, avuso, bhikkhu bahussuto …pe… ditthiya suppatividdha.
dn34:2.3.10: Puna caparam, avuso, bhikkhu kalyanamitto hoti kalyanasahayo kalyanasampavanko.
dn34:2.3.13: Puna caparam, avuso, bhikkhu suvaco hoti sovacassakaranehi dhammehi samannagato, khamo padakkhinaggahi anusasanim.
dn34:2.3.16: Puna caparam, avuso, bhikkhu yani tani sabrahmacarinam uccavacani kinkaraniyani tattha dakkho hoti analaso tatrupayaya vimamsaya samannagato, alam katum, alam samvidhatum.
dn34:2.3.19: Puna caparam, avuso, bhikkhu dhammakamo hoti piyasamudaharo abhidhamme abhivinaye ularapamojjo.
dn34:2.3.22: Puna caparam, avuso, bhikkhu santuttho hoti itaritarehi civarapindapatasenasanagilanappaccayabhesajjaparikkharehi.
dn34:2.3.25: Puna caparam, avuso, bhikkhu araddhaviriyo viharati …pe… kusalesu dhammesu.
dn34:2.3.28: Puna caparam, avuso, bhikkhu satima hoti, paramena satinepakkena samannagato, cirakatampi cirabhasitampi sarita anussarita.
dn34:2.3.31: Puna caparam, avuso, bhikkhu pannava hoti udayatthagaminiya pannaya samannagato, ariyaya nibbedhikaya samma dukkhakkhayagaminiya.
dn34:2.3.37: pathavikasinameko sanjanati uddham adho tiriyam advayam appamanam.
dn34:2.3.46: vinnanakasinameko sanjanati uddham adho tiriyam advayam appamanam.
dn34:2.3.50: cakkhayatanam, rupayatanam, sotayatanam, saddayatanam, ghanayatanam, gandhayatanam, jivhayatanam, rasayatanam, kayayatanam, photthabbayatanam.
dn34:2.3.54: micchaditthi, micchasankappo, micchavaca, micchakammanto, micchaajivo, micchavayamo, micchasati, micchasamadhi, micchananam, micchavimutti.
dn34:2.3.58: panatipato, adinnadanam, kamesumicchacaro, musavado, pisuna vaca, pharusa vaca, samphappalapo, abhijjha, byapado, micchaditthi.
dn34:2.3.62: panatipata veramani, adinnadana veramani, kamesumicchacara veramani, musavada veramani, pisunaya vacaya veramani, pharusaya vacaya veramani, samphappalapa veramani, anabhijjha, abyapado, sammaditthi.
dn34:2.3.66: idhavuso, bhikkhu pancangavippahino hoti, chalangasamannagato, ekarakkho, caturapasseno, panunnapaccekasacco, samavayasatthesano, anavilasankappo, passaddhakayasankharo, suvimuttacitto, suvimuttapanno.
dn34:2.3.68: Idhavuso, bhikkhuno kamacchando pahino hoti, byapado pahino hoti, thinamiddham pahinam hoti, uddhaccakukkuccam pahinam hoti, vicikiccha pahina hoti.
dn34:2.3.69: Evam kho, avuso, bhikkhu pancangavippahino hoti.
dn34:2.3.71: Idhavuso, bhikkhu cakkhuna rupam disva neva sumano hoti na dummano, upekkhako viharati sato sampajano.
dn34:2.3.76: manasa dhammam vinnaya neva sumano hoti na dummano, upekkhako viharati sato sampajano.
dn34:2.3.77: Evam kho, avuso, bhikkhu chalangasamannagato hoti.
dn34:2.3.79: Idhavuso, bhikkhu satarakkhena cetasa samannagato hoti.
dn34:2.3.80: Evam kho, avuso, bhikkhu ekarakkho hoti.
dn34:2.3.82: Idhavuso, bhikkhu sankhayekam patisevati, sankhayekam adhivaseti, sankhayekam parivajjeti, sankhayekam vinodeti.
dn34:2.3.83: Evam kho, avuso, bhikkhu caturapasseno hoti.
dn34:2.3.85: Idhavuso, bhikkhuno yani tani puthusamanabrahmananam puthupaccekasaccani, sabbani tani nunnani honti panunnani cattani vantani muttani pahinani patinissatthani.
dn34:2.3.86: Evam kho, avuso, bhikkhu panunnapaccekasacco hoti.
dn34:2.3.88: Idhavuso, bhikkhuno kamesana pahina hoti, bhavesana pahina hoti, brahmacariyesana patippassaddha.
dn34:2.3.89: Evam kho, avuso, bhikkhu samavayasatthesano hoti.
dn34:2.3.91: Idhavuso, bhikkhuno kamasankappo pahino hoti, byapadasankappo pahino hoti, vihimsasankappo pahino hoti.
dn34:2.3.92: Evam kho, avuso, bhikkhu anavilasankappo hoti.
dn34:2.3.94: Idhavuso, bhikkhu sukhassa ca pahana dukkhassa ca pahana pubbeva somanassadomanassanam atthangama adukkhamasukham upekkhasatiparisuddhim catuttham jhanam upasampajja viharati.
dn34:2.3.95: Evam kho, avuso, bhikkhu passaddhakayasankharo hoti.
dn34:2.3.97: Idhavuso, bhikkhuno raga cittam vimuttam hoti, dosa cittam vimuttam hoti, moha cittam vimuttam hoti.
dn34:2.3.98: Evam kho, avuso, bhikkhu suvimuttacitto hoti.
dn34:2.3.100: Idhavuso, bhikkhu ‘rago me pahino ucchinnamulo talavatthukato anabhavankato ayatim anuppadadhammo’ti pajanati.
dn34:2.3.105: Evam kho, avuso, bhikkhu suvimuttapanno hoti.
dn34:2.3.109: asubhasanna, maranasanna, ahare patikulasanna, sabbaloke anabhiratisanna, aniccasanna, anicce dukkhasanna, dukkhe anattasanna, pahanasanna, viragasanna, nirodhasanna.
dn34:2.3.114: Ye ca micchaditthipaccaya aneke papaka akusala dhamma sambhavanti, te cassa nijjinna honti.
dn34:2.3.124: Ye ca micchavimuttipaccaya aneke papaka akusala dhamma sambhavanti, te cassa nijjinna honti.
dn34:2.3.128: asekkha sammaditthi, asekkho sammasankappo, asekkha sammavaca, asekkho sammakammanto, asekkho sammaajivo, asekkho sammavayamo, asekkha sammasati, asekkho sammasamadhi, asekkham sammananam, asekkha sammavimutti.
dn34:2.3.130: Iti ime satadhamma bhuta taccha tatha avitatha anannatha samma tathagatena abhisambuddha”ti.
dn34:2.3.132: Attamana te bhikkhu ayasmato sariputtassa bhasitam abhinandunti.
